Preserving the gift of vision is our passion. Worldwide delivery of devices, instruments and products required by Ophthalmic Surgeons providing eye care to their patients at facilities and on mission trips to under-served areas.Surgical, Diagnostic, and Medical devices and supplies for ophthalmology practices and missions including surgical microscopes, surgical video systems, surgical lasers, phaco surgical systems, cryo surgical systems, slit lamps, OCTs, instrumentation, consumables, and disposables.
System to Success® From Concept to $100mm+ in sales.

▶ Facilitated transformation of $3mm equipment rental company to $40mm heavy equipment rental company by doubling supply chain and outbound marketing reach with >200% increase in average transaction size and profit margins with specialty equipment rental strategy and execution.▶ Transformed medical device company from initial concept to publicly traded company in one year. Sourced private equity, facilitated reverse merger, and managed SEC filings for public trading. Created global supply chain for FDA approved implantable medical devices. Facilitated acquisition of an implantable medical device manufacturer. Created and managed international stocking distribution partnerships, sales channels, and direct sales force. ▶ Increased spine surgery company revenue >500% to over $6mm with business and market development of spine instrument sales and optimized cash flow solutions for providers.▶ Optimized operating cash flows and patient outcomes for hospitals implanting medical devices with global billing, bundled payment solutions, and risk sharing agreements.▶ Created and managed turn-key regional fiber optic telecommunications sales force ranked first nationally over six competitors for sales increases and total sales.▶ Created marketing and distribution solutions for advanced cholesterol testing company resulting in  the Western Region leading the nation for sales. ▶ Doubled revenue for diagnostic medical device company by delivering marketing and multi-level consultative value and outcomes based sales solutions for cardiovascular diagnostic systems.

Greg Boris is an amazing professional, a star Consultant, and an excellent real estate broker. On top of all of that, he is a highly connected person on LinkedIn. I believe that Greg epitomizes the evolution that is occurring in the way that people do business in the world. Greg's skill at using his own work ethic backed by technology and leveraged by social media allows Greg to achieve the 10x speed necessary to solve business challenges in today's world. In addition to all of that, Greg does all that he can to support other LinkedIn Members around the world. I truly respect and admire all that Greg has accomplished and it would be a pleasure to help him create the solutions needed to solve today's business challenges.

summary: ▶ My vision is Optimal Human Culture through the realization of creative dreams. ▶ I facilitate Optimal Human Culture through realization of YOUR creative dreams.     Together, we make the dream first real and sustainable, then scalable and reproducible.A lifetime of delivering Optimal Outcomes at director and executive levels with enterprise and business development, sales and marketing solutions. Always exceeding expectations and increasing value for stakeholders, customers, and society by creating and facilitating mutually beneficial relationships.When not facilitating Optimal Human Culture, I give time to family and those in need, entertain friends, create music, recreate outdoors, study philosophy and life, exercise, and travel to fascinating places.
